text: <@U049ZDGRHF0> can you tell what you mean by ‘flashed’ information?

hi all jumping in to confirm what <@U03FJQPSC0Y> wrote is true that custom cards & custom tab are currently limited to Sales & Service Enterprise customers. we plan to expand to rest of enterprise tiers later this year but i’m not able to provide an exact timeline yet
I get your point now, what you are asking for is a level of interactivity we are looking to support, but it’s not available right now.
